game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart. Players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with repairing the timestream and saving humanity from extinction.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic future where the player must navigate through ancient ruins to discover the source of the timeline's destruction: an event known as 'The Great Dissonance'.
game.ending: As players progress through the game, they unravel the mysteries behind 'The Great Dissonance' and ultimately face off against a powerful entity responsible for the timestream's fragmentation. With time itself hanging in the balance, the player must make a choice that will either restore order to the universe or plunge it into eternal chaos.
